com.googlecode.imheresi1.logiclayer
Class User

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.imheresi1.logiclayer.User

public class User
extends java.lang.Object

Class that implements the User type Holds the private and public data of the user as well as the friends PublicInfo data

Author:
Arthur de Souza Ribeiro, Jose Laerte, Raquel Rolim, Raissa Sarmento
See Also:
PublicInfo
